sections.MISSION:
3/2CR conducts Machine Gun Academy at Range 204 from 10-18OCT2024 IOT increase individual knowledge and lethality on crew served weapon systems.
Task org: OIC: 1LT Sullivan, Kurt RSO: SGT Weeks Instructors: SSG Carrasco, SSG Fennel, SSG Garcia, SSG Jordan, SSG Voss
sections.KEY TASKS:
All Training is conducted Safely
Prioritize hands on training and range time
Training Soldiers on Squadron TTPs/SOPs
sections.END STATE:
All soldiers successfully demonstrate proficiency and knowledge utilizing crew served weapons.
Time restrictions 24 hours:
Concurrent training: Gun emplacement
Crew drills
Disassemble/Assembly
Gunner Down/Up
Issues & concerns
PCU/Targetry Plan
Ammo Allocation
Timeline:
18OCT24 – Classroom MG Theory, Introduction, Offensive/Defense Tactics
21OCT24 – Range Hands on
22OCT24 – LFX1
23OCT24 – LFX2
24OCT24 – Offensive/Defensive and Maneuver Tactics
25OCT24 – LFX3 Culminating Event
